name: Zombeats - Bevy Game Jam #3
description:
SUMMARY

Zombeats is a third person, endless survival game with a primary objective of slaying as many zombies as possible. The settings is staged on a black and white checkered dance floor with upbeat music playing in the background, hence the title, Zombeats. Zombies will randomly spawn on the map on a two second interval. The zombies will spawn with more health over time. Random drops will occur that will provide positive side effects when collected. Green completely refills stamina. Red will add 20 HP. Yellow will double your damage for 15 seconds.

CONTROLS

Action Keyboard/Mouse Gamepad (Xbox) forward W L stick back S L stick left A L stick right D L stick shoot LMB Right trigger sprint L shift L stick click zoom in scroll up D-pad up zoom out scroll down D-pad down rotate camera mouse R stick to main menu ESC start
